Vps_CaptVipScParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API » VPS VIP Capture API

UInt32 enableCoeffLoad
 

Detailed Description

Capture scaler information.

Only valid when Vps_CaptVipOutInfo.scEnable is or can be TRUE.

Note, upscaling is not supported for capture path

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_CaptVipScParams::enableCoeffLoad

Enable scaler coefficient load during IOCTL_VPS_CAPT_SET_SC_PARAMS If this is set to TRUE, it may result in the instance getting stopped, reset, and restarted to load new coefficients as per the provided new scaling factor. This may result in some frame loss. The scaler coefficients are loaded only if there is a change in either the horizontal or vertical scaling set. The best scaler coefficients to be used are determined internally when scCoeffConfig in this structure is set to NULL. If the user has provided scaler coefficients or coefficient sets to be used, these are used instead of internally calculating the best scaler coefficients.

Fvid2_CropConfig Vps_CaptVipScParams::inCropCfg

Scaler input crop config.

Vps_ScConfig Vps_CaptVipScParams::scCfg

Scaler config.

Vps_ScCoeffParams* Vps_CaptVipScParams::scCoeffCfg
